scripts.dev: bun run db:gen && cd apps/web && bun run dev
scripts.build: bun run db:gen && bun run type-check && cd apps/web && bun run build
scripts.test: cd apps/web && bun run test || true
scripts.pre-commit: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.ci: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run test && bun run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules bun.lockb apps/web/.next apps/web/node_modules && rm -rf ~/.bun/install/cache
scripts.rebuild: bun run fresh && bun run build
